p: Toward the direction of finding new methods for nowcasting COVID-19 to increase the preparedness of health care systems, this study suggests that Google Trends data strongly correlates with COVID-19 cases and deaths worldwide and in the examined countries. Most importantly though, there is a critical point, after which the relationshipâ€™s strength (in almost all cases) monotonously decreases, even if the correlation remains statistically significant, with Italy having the sharpest downward curve.
